mn50:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma mahamoggallano bhaggesu viharati susumaragire bhesakalavane migadaye.
mn50:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma mahamoggallano abbhokase cankamati.
mn50:2.2: Tena kho pana samayena maro papima ayasmato mahamoggallanassa kucchigato hoti kotthamanupavittho.
mn50:2.4: “kim nu kho me kucchi garugaro viya?
mn50:2.6: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano cankama orohitva viharam pavisitva pannatte asane nisidi.
mn50:3.1: Nisajja kho ayasma mahamoggallano paccattam yoniso manasakasi.
mn50:3.2: Addasa kho ayasma mahamoggallano maram papimantam kucchigatam kotthamanupavittham.
mn50:3.7: Ma te ahosi digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya”ti.
mn50:4.2: “ajanameva kho mam ayam samano apassam evamaha:
mn50:4.6: Ma te ahosi digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya’ti.
mn50:4.7: Yopissa so sattha sopi mam neva khippam janeyya, kuto pana mam ayam savako janissati”ti?
mn50:5.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano maram papimantam etadavoca:
mn50:5.2: “evampi kho taham, papima, janami, ma tvam mannittho:
mn50:5.6: ‘ajanameva kho mam ayam samano apassam evamaha—
mn50:5.10: Ma te ahosi digharattam ahitaya dukkhayati.
mn50:5.11: Yopissa so sattha sopi mam neva khippam janeyya, kuto pana mam ayam savako janissati’”ti?
mn50:6.2: “janameva kho mam ayam samano passam evamaha:
mn50:6.6: Ma te ahosi digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya’”ti.
mn50:6.7: Atha kho maro papima ayasmato mahamoggallanassa mukhato uggantva paccaggale atthasi.
mn50:7.1: Addasa kho ayasma mahamoggallano maram papimantam paccaggale thitam;
mn50:7.3: “etthapi kho taham, papima, passami; ma tvam mannittho
mn50:8.1: Bhutapubbaham, papima, dusi nama maro ahosim, tassa me kali nama bhagini.
mn50:9.1: Tena kho pana, papima, samayena kakusandho bhagava araham sammasambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
mn50:9.2: Kakusandhassa kho pana, papima, bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa vidhurasanjivam nama savakayugam ahosi aggam bhaddayugam.
mn50:9.3: Yavata kho pana, papima, kakusandhassa bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa savaka.
mn50:9.4: Tesu na ca koci ayasmata vidhurena samasamo hoti yadidam dhammadesanaya.
mn50:9.5: Imina kho evam, papima, pariyayena ayasmato vidhurassa vidhuroteva samanna udapadi.
mn50:10.1: Ayasma pana, papima, sanjivo arannagatopi rukkhamulagatopi sunnagaragatopi appakasireneva sannavedayitanirodham samapajjati.
mn50:10.2: Bhutapubbam, papima, ayasma sanjivo annatarasmim rukkhamule sannavedayitanirodham samapanno nisinno hoti.
mn50:10.3: Addasamsu kho, papima, gopalaka pasupalaka kassaka pathavino ayasmantam sanjivam annatarasmim rukkhamule sannavedayitanirodham samapannam nisinnam;
mn50:10.8: Atha kho te, papima, gopalaka pasupalaka kassaka pathavino tinanca katthanca gomayanca sankaddhitva ayasmato sanjivassa kaye upacinitva aggim datva pakkamimsu.
mn50:11.1: Atha kho, papima, ayasma sanjivo tassa rattiya accayena taya samapattiya vutthahitva civarani papphotetva pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya gamam pindaya pavisi.
mn50:11.2: Addasamsu kho te, papima, gopalaka pasupalaka kassaka pathavino ayasmantam sanjivam pindaya carantam;
mn50:11.5: Ayam samano nisinnakova kalankato, svayam patisanjivito’ti.
mn50:11.6: Imina kho evam, papima, pariyayena ayasmato sanjivassa sanjivoteva samanna udapadi.
mn50:12.1: Atha kho, papima, dusissa marassa etadahosi:
mn50:12.2: ‘imesam kho aham bhikkhunam silavantanam kalyanadhammanam neva janami agatim va gatim va.
mn50:12.4: etha, tumhe bhikkhu silavante kalyanadhamme akkosatha paribhasatha rosetha vihesetha.
mn50:12.5: Appeva nama tumhehi akkosiyamananam paribhasiyamananam rosiyamananam vihesiyamananam siya cittassa annathattam, yatha tam dusi maro labhetha otaran’ti.
mn50:12.6: Atha kho te, papima, dusi maro brahmanagahapatike anvavisi:
mn50:12.7: ‘etha, tumhe bhikkhu silavante kalyanadhamme akkosatha paribhasatha rosetha vihesetha.
mn50:12.8: Appeva nama tumhehi akkosiyamananam paribhasiyamananam rosiyamananam vihesiyamananam siya cittassa annathattam, yatha tam dusi maro labhetha otaran’ti.
mn50:13.1: Atha kho te, papima, brahmanagahapatika anvavisittha dusina marena bhikkhu silavante kalyanadhamme akkosanti paribhasanti rosenti vihesenti:
mn50:13.2: ‘ime pana mundaka samanaka ibbha kinha bandhupadapacca “jhayinosma jhayinosma”ti pattakkhandha adhomukha madhurakajata jhayanti pajjhayanti nijjhayanti apajjhayanti.
mn50:13.3: Seyyathapi nama uluko rukkhasakhayam musikam maggayamano jhayati pajjhayati nijjhayati apajjhayati;
mn50:13.4: evamevime mundaka samanaka ibbha kinha bandhupadapacca “jhayinosma jhayinosma”ti pattakkhandha adhomukha madhurakajata jhayanti pajjhayanti nijjhayanti apajjhayanti.
mn50:13.5: Seyyathapi nama kotthu naditire macche maggayamano jhayati pajjhayati nijjhayati apajjhayati;
mn50:13.6: evamevime mundaka samanaka ibbha kinha bandhupadapacca “jhayinosma jhayinosma”ti pattakkhandha adhomukha madhurakajata jhayanti pajjhayanti nijjhayanti apajjhayanti.
mn50:13.7: Seyyathapi nama bilaro sandhisamalasankatire musikam maggayamano jhayati pajjhayati nijjhayati apajjhayati;
mn50:13.8: evamevime mundaka samanaka ibbha kinha bandhupadapacca “jhayinosma jhayinosma”ti pattakkhandha adhomukha madhurakajata jhayanti pajjhayanti nijjhayanti apajjhayanti.
mn50:13.9: Seyyathapi nama gadrabho vahacchinno sandhisamalasankatire jhayati pajjhayati nijjhayati apajjhayati;
mn50:13.10: evamevime mundaka samanaka ibbha kinha bandhupadapacca “jhayinosma jhayinosma”ti pattakkhandha adhomukha madhurakajata jhayanti pajjhayanti nijjhayanti apajjhayanti’ti.
mn50:13.11: Ye kho pana, papima, tena samayena manussa kalam karonti yebhuyyena kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti.
mn50:14.1: Atha kho, papima, kakusandho bhagava araham sammasambuddho bhikkhu amantesi:
mn50:14.3: etha, tumhe bhikkhu silavante kalyanadhamme akkosatha paribhasatha rosetha vihesetha, appeva nama tumhehi akkosiyamananam paribhasiyamananam rosiyamananam vihesiyamananam siya cittassa annathattam, yatha tam dusi maro labhetha otaran’ti.
mn50:14.4: Etha, tumhe, bhikkhave, mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharatha, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharatha.
mn50:14.7: upekkhasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharatha, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam upekkhasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharatha’ti.
mn50:15.1: Atha kho te, papima, bhikkhu kakusandhena bhagavata arahata sammasambuddhena evam ovadiyamana evam anusasiyamana arannagatapi rukkhamulagatapi sunnagaragatapi mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharimsu, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharimsu.
mn50:15.4: upekkhasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharimsu, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam upekkhasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharimsu.
mn50:16.1: Atha kho, papima, dusissa marassa etadahosi:
mn50:16.2: ‘evampi kho aham karonto imesam bhikkhunam silavantanam kalyanadhammanam neva janami agatim va gatim va, yannunaham brahmanagahapatike anvaviseyyam:
mn50:16.3: “etha, tumhe bhikkhu silavante kalyanadhamme sakkarotha garum karotha manetha pujetha,
mn50:16.4: appeva nama tumhehi sakkariyamananam garukariyamananam maniyamananam pujiyamananam siya cittassa annathattam, yatha tam dusi maro labhetha otaran”’ti.
mn50:17.1: Atha kho te, papima, dusi maro brahmanagahapatike anvavisi:
mn50:17.2: ‘etha, tumhe bhikkhu silavante kalyanadhamme sakkarotha garum karotha manetha pujetha,
mn50:17.3: appeva nama tumhehi sakkariyamananam garukariyamananam maniyamananam pujiyamananam siya cittassa annathattam, yatha tam dusi maro labhetha otaran’ti.
mn50:17.4: Atha kho te, papima, brahmanagahapatika anvavittha dusina marena bhikkhu silavante kalyanadhamme sakkaronti garum karonti manenti pujenti.
mn50:17.5: Ye kho pana, papima, tena samayena manussa kalam karonti yebhuyyena kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti.
mn50:18.1: Atha kho, papima, kakusandho bhagava araham sammasambuddho bhikkhu amantesi:
mn50:18.3: “etha, tumhe bhikkhu silavante kalyanadhamme sakkarotha garum karotha manetha pujetha,
mn50:18.4: appeva nama tumhehi sakkariyamananam garukariyamananam maniyamananam pujiyamananam siya cittassa annathattam, yatha tam dusi maro labhetha otaran”ti.
mn50:18.5: Etha, tumhe, bhikkhave, asubhanupassino kaye viharatha, ahare patikulasannino, sabbaloke anabhiratisannino, sabbasankharesu aniccanupassino’ti.
mn50:19.1: Atha kho te, papima, bhikkhu kakusandhena bhagavata arahata sammasambuddhena evam ovadiyamana evam anusasiyamana arannagatapi rukkhamulagatapi sunnagaragatapi asubhanupassino kaye viharimsu, ahare patikulasannino, sabbaloke anabhiratisannino, sabbasankharesu aniccanupassino.
mn50:20.1: Atha kho, papima, kakusandho bhagava araham sammasambuddho pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya ayasmata vidhurena pacchasamanena gamam pindaya pavisi.
mn50:21.1: Atha kho, papima, dusi maro annataram kumarakam anvavisitva sakkharam gahetva ayasmato vidhurassa sise paharamadasi; sisam vobhindi.
mn50:21.2: Atha kho, papima, ayasma vidhuro bhinnena sisena lohitena galantena kakusandhamyeva bhagavantam arahantam sammasambuddham pitthito pitthito anubandhi.
mn50:21.3: Atha kho, papima, kakusandho bhagava araham sammasambuddho nagapalokitam apalokesi:
mn50:21.5: Sahapalokanaya ca pana, papima, dusi maro tamha ca thana cavi mahanirayanca upapajji.
mn50:22.1: Tassa kho pana, papima, mahanirayassa tayo namadheyya honti—
mn50:22.2: chaphassayataniko itipi, sankusamahato itipi, paccattavedaniyo itipi.
mn50:22.3: Atha kho mam, papima, nirayapala upasankamitva etadavocum:
mn50:22.4: ‘yada kho te, marisa, sankuna sanku hadaye samagaccheyya.
mn50:23.1: So kho aham, papima, bahuni vassani bahuni vassasatani bahuni vassasahassani tasmim mahaniraye apaccim.
mn50:23.2: Dasavassasahassani tasseva mahanirayassa ussade apaccim vutthanimam nama vedanam vediyamano.
mn50:23.3: Tassa mayham, papima, evarupo kayo hoti, seyyathapi manussassa.
mn50:32.4: Dusi ca maro dasamo ca vaggo.
